title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the collaborative ideation platform, including user roles (ideator, reviewer, approver), workflows, integration with existing systems such as single sign-on (SSO) and project management tools, data models, security considerations, scalability to accommodate thousands of users, performance requirements for real-time collaboration, and accessibility considerations for diverse user needs.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and deployment infrastructure.

title: Implement User Authentication and Authorization
description: Develop the user authentication and authorization mechanisms by integrating with existing identity providers (e.g., Active Directory, LDAP, OAuth providers) and role-based access control (RBAC). Ensure compliance with industry-standard security practices and data protection regulations. Implement mechanisms for user registration, password management, multi-factor authentication, and session management using token-based authentication (e.g., JWT) for stateless authentication and authorization. Provide a flexible and extensible authorization model to support different levels of access and permissions based on user roles and responsibilities. Consider implementing token refresh mechanisms for long-lived tokens. Implement appropriate security measures such as input validation, output encoding, and protection against common web vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, CSRF, SQL injection). In addition, ensure that the solution is scalable to handle a large number of users and requests. Update the user interface for registration, password management, and other authentication-related features. To enhance security, incorporate measures like rate limiting and account lockout to prevent brute force attacks. For the token refresh mechanism, consider using a sliding window approach to minimize token exposure duration.

title: Design and Implement Collaborative Ideation Workflows
description: Define and implement the core workflows for idea submission, discussion, voting, and refinement, including notifications and collaboration features.

title: Set up Database and Data Models
description: Design and implement the database schema and data models for storing and managing ideas, comments, votes, user data, and related metadata. Consider optimizing for scalability and performance, and ensure compliance with best practices for data security.

title: Implement Reporting and Analytics (Updated)
description: Develop reporting and analytics features to track idea engagement, voting trends, user participation, and other relevant metrics. This should include a dashboard for visualizing data and generating reports. Ensure proper data aggregation, filtering capabilities, performance optimizations for handling large data sets, and integration with existing project components such as User Authentication and Authorization. (Suggested dependencies: Design System Architecture, Set up Database and Data Models, Implement User Authentication and Authorization). This task could benefit from further input from a code-architect or frontend-developer to ensure seamless integration.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Models

title: Implement Integration with Existing Systems
description: Develop integrations with existing enterprise systems, such as project management tools, communication platforms, knowledge bases, and authentication/authorization systems. Ensure secure data exchange, handle different data formats, and implement error handling and logging mechanisms. Prioritize systems based on business impact and user needs.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Features
description: Ensure the platform adheres to security best practices and compliance requirements, including data encryption, audit logging, and access controls.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the platform to different environments. The pipeline should include steps for linting, unit testing, integration testing, building artifacts, and deploying to staging and production environments. Ensure proper configuration management, environment parity, and rollback strategies. Additionally, consider implementing monitoring, logging, and alerting mechanisms to track the health and performance of the deployed application. To enhance security, include security scanning in the pipeline as well.

title: Develop Comprehensive Test Plans and Automation Scripts
description: Create comprehensive test plans and automation scripts for functional, integration, and performance testing of the platform. Include regression testing to ensure the stability of the platform post-deployment.

title: Create Comprehensive User Documentation and Training Materials for CollaborativeIdeationPlatform
description: Develop user guides, training materials, and online help resources that are clear, concise, and comprehensive to effectively assist users in utilizing the platform, including step-by-step instructions, tutorial videos, and FAQs.
